pr_title: [phc] Fix duplicate id in JRM channel definition

timeline.message:
Correct duplicate id in channel definition

Signed-off-by: Jonas Hohaus <jh@gnlpf.net>

timeline.bodyText: You can add the attribute unit="s" to the `parameter element to specify this is in seconds. Then it's not needed to add the unit in the description. But you can change that in some future improvement.
timeline.author: Hilbrand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -94,25 +88,25 @@
 			<parameter name="upDownTime1" type="integer" min="1" max="65535">
 				<advanced>true</advanced>
 				<label>Time Shutter 1</label>
-				<description>The Time which the first shutter needs to move up/down.</description>
+				<description>The time (in seconds) which the first shutter needs to move up/down.</description>
